name: Inka Trail 2 Days 1 Night
description: This is the shortest trek to Machu Picchu, but still we will take you into the one of the world’s greatest hiking trips. During these two days, we will hike through the real Inca trail. The trail traverses the Peruvian Andean Mountains that runs into the Amazonian rain forest; this is adorned with many Inca buildings that give a unique beauty to the hiking tour. The Inca trail finish at Machu Picchu where you will have a complete guided tour around the citadel.
